EmailTemplate.name: 181010_Category Strike Webinar Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you joining the Silencing Noisy Healthcare webinar?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
You should have received an invite to our upcoming webinar, Silencing Noisy Healthcare. I hope that you’ll join us as we unveil an entirely new era of healthcare that silences the noise, addresses the chronic condition epidemic, and transforms lives.
Webinar: Silencing Noisy Healthcare Featuring: Livongo Chief Executive Officer Glen Tullman and Chief Medical Officer Dr. Jennifer Schneider Date: October 30: 10:00 - 10:30 AM PT
Register Now https://zoom.us/webinar/register/3315391868880/WN_X3GrNVSpR6i332dAqglOPQ
Whether you can attend the webinar or not, I look forward to talking with you about our new approach to healthcare. I’ll follow up after the webinar to arrange a convenient time. Thanks,
[YOUR SIGNATURE]
